overview: A very ordinary high school student, Keiyu Ninomiya, suddenly joins the photography club. However, there was a "spirit photo club" that investigates psychic photography, even in the photography department. Kayu sees the terrible truth hidden in each psychic photo as he investigates with Makimura, director of the same psych photography department and senior Lili. Includes the first episode "Abandoned House", which rebooted the old work from a new perspective, and the second episode, "The Indelible Face," which is a completely new story.
title: The Ghost Photo Club Reboot
